attributes.action: Pull out of Afghanistan immediately to halt further troop injuries and deaths
attributes.additional_details: This is a pointless  war that no one will win. Nothing will be achieved by it as there will be no stability after the allies have left. You can not impose a Central Government on a tribal nation. The current Afghani Government we are supporting appears to be corrupt , so why are we supporting it? This war has little support from the British public , they only support the troops who have to suffer.
